00027 inline void nargchk(bool cond)
00028 {
00029     if (!cond)
00030         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00031 }

00042 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00043                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00044 {
00045     nargchk(nrhs>=2 && nlhs<=2);
00046     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00047     int id = rhs[0].toInt();
00048     string method(rhs[1].toString());
00049 
00050     // Constructor call
00051     if (method == "new") {
00052         nargchk(nlhs<=1);
00053         if (nrhs==3 && rhs[2].isChar())
00054             obj_[++last_id] = HOGDescriptor(rhs[2].toString());
00055         else {
00056             nargchk((nrhs%2)==0);
00057             obj_[++last_id] = HOGDescriptor();
00058             HOGDescriptor& obj = obj_[last_id];
00059             for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00060                 string key(rhs[i].toString());
00061                 if (key == "WinSize")
00062                     obj.winSize = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00063                 else if (key == "BlockSize")
00064                     obj.blockSize = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00065                 else if (key == "BlockStride")
00066                     obj.blockStride = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00067                 else if (key == "CellSize")
00068                     obj.cellSize = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00069                 else if (key == "NBins")
00070                     obj.nbins = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00071                 else if (key == "DerivAperture")
00072                     obj.derivAperture = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00073                 else if (key == "WinSigma")
00074                     obj.winSigma = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00075                 else if (key == "HistogramNormType")
00076                     obj.histogramNormType = HistogramNormType[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00077                 else if (key == "L2HysThreshold")
00078                     obj.L2HysThreshold = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00079                 else if (key == "GammaCorrection")
00080                     obj.gammaCorrection = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00081                 else if (key == "NLevels")
00082                     obj.nlevels = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00083                 else
00084                     mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unknown option %s",key.c_str());
00085             }
00086         }
00087         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00088         return;
00089     }
00090 
00091     // Big operation switch
00092     HOGDescriptor& obj = obj_[id];
00093     if (method == "delete") {
00094         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00095         obj_.erase(id);
00096     }
00097     else if (method == "getDescriptorSize") {
00098         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00099         plhs[0] = MxArray(static_cast<int>(obj.getDescriptorSize()));
00100     }
00101     else if (method == "checkDetectorSize") {
00102         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00103         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.checkDetectorSize());
00104     }
00105     else if (method == "getWinSigma") {
00106         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00107         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.getWinSigma());
00108     }
00109     else if (method == "setSVMDetector") {
00110         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00111         if (rhs[2].isChar()) {
00112             string key(rhs[2].toString());
00113             if (key=="Default")
00114                 obj.setSVMDetector(HOGDescriptor::getDefaultPeopleDetector());
00115             else if (key=="Daimler")
00116                 obj.setSVMDetector(HOGDescriptor::getDaimlerPeopleDetector());
00117             else
00118                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00119         }
00120         else
00121             obj.setSVMDetector(rhs[2].toVector<float>());
00122     }
00123     else if (method == "readALTModel") {
00124         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00125         obj.readALTModel(rhs[2].toString());
00126     }
00127     else if (method == "load") {
00128         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs<=1);
00129         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.load(rhs[2].toString()));
00130     }
00131     else if (method == "save") {
00132         nargchk(nrhs==3 && nlhs==0);
00133         obj.save(rhs[2].toString());
00134     }
00135     else if (method == "compute") {
00136         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && (nrhs%2)==1 && nlhs<=1);
00137 
00138         Mat img(rhs[2].isUint8() ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00139         Size winStride;
00140         Size padding;
00141         vector<Point> locations;
00142         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00143             string key = rhs[i].toString();
00144             if (key=="WinStride")
00145                 winStride = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00146             else if (key=="Padding")
00147                 padding = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00148             else if (key=="Locations")
00149                 locations = rhs[i+1].toVector<Point>();
00150             else
00151                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00152         }
00153 
00154         // Run
00155         vector<float> descriptors;
00156         obj.compute(img,descriptors,winStride,padding,locations);
00157         Mat m(descriptors);
00158         plhs[0] = MxArray(m.reshape(0,m.total()/obj.getDescriptorSize()));
00159     }
00160     else if (method == "detect") {
00161         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && (nrhs%2)==1 && nlhs<=2);
00162 
00163         Mat img(rhs[2].isUint8() ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00164         double hitThreshold = 0;
00165         Size winStride;
00166         Size padding;
00167         vector<Point> searchLocations;
00168         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00169             string key = rhs[i].toString();
00170             if (key=="HitThreshold")
00171                 hitThreshold = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00172             else if (key=="WinStride")
00173                 winStride = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00174             else if (key=="Padding")
00175                 padding = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00176             else if (key=="Locations")
00177                 searchLocations = rhs[i+1].toVector<Point>();
00178             else
00179                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00180         }
00181 
00182         // Run
00183         vector<Point> foundLocations;
00184         vector<double> weights;
00185         obj.detect(img, foundLocations, weights, hitThreshold, winStride,
00186             padding, searchLocations);
00187         plhs[0] = MxArray(foundLocations);
00188         if (nlhs>1)
00189             plhs[1] = MxArray(Mat(weights));
00190     }
00191     else if (method == "detectMultiScale") {
00192         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && (nrhs%2)==1 && nlhs<=2);
00193 
00194         Mat img(rhs[2].isUint8() ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));

00196         Size winStride;
00197         Size padding;
00198         double scale = 1.05;
00199         double finalThreshold = 2.0;
00200         bool useMeanshiftGrouping = false;

00202             string key = rhs[i].toString();

00205             else if (key=="WinStride")
00206                 winStride = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00207             else if (key=="Padding")
00208                 padding = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00209             else if (key=="Scale")
00210                 scale = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00211             else if (key=="FinalThreshold")
00212                 finalThreshold = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00213             else if (key=="UseMeanshiftGrouping")
00214                 useMeanshiftGrouping = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00215             else
00216                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00217         }
00218 
00219         // Run
00220         vector<Rect> foundLocations;
00221         vector<double> weights;
00222         obj.detectMultiScale(img, foundLocations, weights, hitThreshold, winStride,
00223             padding, scale, finalThreshold, useMeanshiftGrouping);
00224         plhs[0] = MxArray(foundLocations);
00225         if (nlhs>1)
00226             plhs[1] = MxArray(Mat(weights));
00227     }
00228     else if (method == "computeGradient") {
00229         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && (nrhs%2)==1 && nlhs<=2);
00230 
00231         Mat img(rhs[2].isUint8() ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00232         Size paddingTL;
00233         Size paddingBR;
00234         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00235             string key = rhs[i].toString();
00236             if (key=="PaddingTL")
00237                 paddingTL = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00238             else if (key=="PaddingBR")
00239                 paddingBR = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00240             else
00241                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00242         }
00243 
00244         // Run
00245         Mat grad, angleOfs;
00246         obj.computeGradient(img,grad,angleOfs,paddingTL,paddingBR);
00247         plhs[0] = MxArray(grad);
00248         if (nlhs>1)
00249             plhs[1] = MxArray(angleOfs);
00250     }
00251     else if (method == "winSize") {
00252         if (nlhs==1 && nrhs==2)
00253             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.winSize);
00254         else if (nlhs==0 && nrhs==3)
00255             obj.winSize = rhs[2].toSize();
00256         else
00257             nargchk(false);
